panels.visual: Visual: A massive DIRE WOLF blocks an ancient stone bridge over a rushing river. Silver-gray fur bristles, teeth bared, but one front leg hovers off the ground - purple-glowing chains of shadow wrap around it. The wolf snarls, but there's pain in its eyes. Location: Stone bridge over river, Whispering Valley Characters: Lightsword, Cursed Dire Wolf
panels.dialogue: (Caption): "Trial One: The Beast at the Bridge" (SFX): "GRRRRRRRR..."
